e20-3yp-FlickNest.title: FlickNest
e20-3yp-FlickNest.description: FlickNest is an innovative smart automation system that allows you to control your electronic devices effortlessly through hand gestures. Powered by the advanced FlickNest Smart Bracelet, it transforms your gestures into seamless commands, enabling intuitive and hands-free management of your home environment.

e20-3yp-OceanEyes.title: OceanEyes
e20-3yp-OceanEyes.description: OceanEyes is an Autonomous Sea Weather and Pollution Monitoring Buoy.

e20-3yp-SkyT.title: SkyT
e20-3yp-SkyT.description: Drone based smart crop management system

e20-3yp-Smart-Aquarium.title: Smart Aquarium
e20-3yp-Smart-Aquarium.description: An intelligent aquarium system that automates water quality monitoring, feeding, and environment control. Key features include pH and O₂ level measurement, temperature monitoring, automated feeding, plant light control, and fish activity tracking

e20-3yp-Smart-Canteen-Management-System.title: Smart Canteen Management System
e20-3yp-Smart-Canteen-Management-System.description: Smart canteen management system is a system designed to increase the efficiency of cafeterias in different working environments and to provide more user friendly functions such as smart pay, an app to keep track of user activities, digital touch screen for the menu item selection,congestion alert system.

e20-3yp-Smart-Environmental-Monitoring-S.title: Smart Environmental Monitoring System for Palm Oil Plantation
e20-3yp-Smart-Environmental-Monitoring-S.description: The Smart Environmental Monitoring system will not only simplify and streamline plantation management operations but also enhance efficiency and promote sustainability. By offering real-time data collection and actionable insights, our solution will empower decision-making and optimize resource usage.

e20-3yp-Smart-IOT-Indoor-Lighting-System.title: Smart IOT Indoor Lighting System
e20-3yp-Smart-IOT-Indoor-Lighting-System.description: This Smart IoT Lighting System is designed for indoor lighting, integrating hardware with cloud connectivity for seamless control. Users can conveniently configure preferences and manage settings via a secure mobile app with voice command support, ensuring personalized and efficient lighting experiences, ease of use, and robust data security.

e20-3yp-VR-Multiplayer-Golf-Game.title: VR Multiplayer Golf Game
e20-3yp-VR-Multiplayer-Golf-Game.description: VR-Multiplayer-Golf-Game allows multiple users to play golf in VR environment. The game features a virtual environment which allows a user to have an immersive experience.
